actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to release restrictions on certain property located in Calcasieu Parish, Louisiana, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Releases restrictions on the use or conveyance of certain property in Calcasieu Parish, Louisiana. Provides that the United States shall have the use of such property for national defense purposes in time of war or national emergency.

titles.title: A bill to release restrictions on certain property located in Calcasieu Parish, Louisiana, and for other purposes.
